column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////We picked this restaurant based on all the reviews
column2: but we did not have the same experience. Our party ordered the pork belly poutine
column6: and a the chicken corn chowder. The corn chowder was sent back because nobody in our party liked it. The steak
column7: and other dishes were just mediocre. However
column8: we all really enjoyed the grilled cheese. It was unique and had great flavor.
